arts.ttl: Burnley v Chelsea: Premier League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Premier League updates from the 12.30pm GMT kick-off ⚽️ Live scoreboard | Latest tables | Top scorers | Mail Taha Here’s how the aforementioned Burnley win eight years ago played out. It is a gloriously wet and windy day at Turf Moor as Burnley and Chelsea prepare to reawaken their Premier League campaigns after the international break. The Blues have won their last seven Saturday lunchtime kick-offs, so will fancy their chances in Lancashire. They are looking to prove they are title contenders, and a win today would move Chelsea up to second for a few hours at least. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Burnley vs Chelsea – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea return to Premier League action on Saturday lunchtime with a trip to Turf Moor, aiming to maintain their pursuit of the league leaders. The Blues are in excellent form. In fact, they have won four of their last five league matches to cement their spot in the top three. arts.ttl: Chelsea XI vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea travel to Turf Moor on Saturday, looking to extend a dominant away record against Burnley. The Blues have won eight of their nine Premier League visits to this ground. In fact, a win here would make history. They would become only the third team in English top-flight history to win seven consecutive away games […] The post Chelsea XI vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.sum: However, Enzo Maresca revealed in his press conference on Friday morning that Palmer wouldn’t be available for the trip to Turf Moor, the Barcelona and Arsenal games due to a fractured toe suffered in an accident at home. Chelsea and Burnley face off in this weekend’s Saturday lunchtime kickoff with the Blues looking to keep their good form in the Premier League while the hosts are looking to bounce back following two defeats in a row.
